title: Roxy Jacenko: Is Jackie O the mysterious Paddington Pooper?
text:
Roxy Jacenko is a woman on a mission as she continues her efforts to track down the infamous 'Paddington Pooper'.

But the celebrity publicist made the surprising decision on Tuesday to remove CCTV footage from Instagram of the female jogger defecating outside her office.

Explaining her reason for doing this, Roxy said she was worried false rumours were being spread about the identity of the woman in the video.

Wild accusations: Roxy Jacenko (left) has addressed rumours the mysterious Paddington Pooper is actually her good friend, radio host Jackie 'O' Henderson (right)

During an interview with KIIS FM, Roxy said that her followers had pointed the finger of blame at radio host Jackie 'O' Henderson.

She was outraged that Jackie, who is a longtime friend, was being implicated in the scandal and so removed the video in order to delete the defamatory comments.

Roxy said: 'The only reason I took the videos down is because everyone kept saying it's Jackie O and I thought, "Oh, good grief, I better take it down for her".'

Shocking behaviour: During an interview with KIIS FM on Tuesday, Roxy said that her followers had accused Jackie of being the poo jogger who targeted her office in Paddington this week

Jackie laughed off the false rumours, saying that she isn't as 'skinny' as the woman in the CCTV footage.

The 'Paddington pooper' saga began on Monday night, when Roxy shared shocking vision of the incident to her Instagram account.

She uploaded videos of the woman running behind a car, pulling down her pants and relieving herself on two separate occasions.

Uh oh! Jackie (pictured) laughed off the false rumours, saying that she isn't as 'skinny' as the woman in the CCTV footage

Furious with the young woman's behaviour, Roxy told Daily Mail Australia she has found faeces on the street for three weeks.

She said: 'It's disgusting, it's a lovely street lined with heritage terraces, kids playing and riding their bikes. Human faeces shouldn't be on any street. Something needs to be done.'

On Tuesday, Roxy confirmed that police are investigating the matter, saying: 'We have been sent info which will be passed to the police.'
description: Roxy Jacenko is a woman on a mission as she continues her efforts to track down  the infamous 'Paddington Pooper'.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
